Sentencas: Recently, extensive studies on the ceria-based two-phase composites as functional electrolytes have created excellent 300-600 degrees C fuel cell technology.
Titulo: Theoretical approach on ceria-based two-phase electrolytes for low temperature (300-600 °C) solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: There is an emergence need to deepen the knowledge and to develop theoretical methodologies in this field.
Titulo: Theoretical approach on ceria-based two-phase electrolytes for low temperature (300-600 °C) solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The feasibility to design and develop two-phase materials as superionic conductors for 300-600 degrees C solid oxide fuel cells (LTSOFCs) is reported.
Titulo: Theoretical approach on ceria-based two-phase electrolytes for low temperature (300-600 °C) solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The superionic conductivity at 300-600 degrees C in two-phase materials where the interfaces between the constituent phases are constructed as superionic highways resulting in interfacial high ionic conduction.
Titulo: Theoretical approach on ceria-based two-phase electrolytes for low temperature (300-600 °C) solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The material architecture and design presented in this report thus reaches beyond the conventional molecular way to synthesize new compounds.
Titulo: Theoretical approach on ceria-based two-phase electrolytes for low temperature (300-600 °C) solid oxide fuel cells
